title: developer
description: I make apps and websites for myself and others.

title: student
description: I am currently a university student at the Budapest University of Technology and Economics studying Computer Engineering.

title: teacher
description: During high school I helped other students learn programming and the usage of Microsoft office, and during University I held laboratories for students of the programming courses. I was responsible for grading the lab and homework of a group of students and helping them learn the basics of programming using the C and C++ languages.

title: climber
description: I started rock climbing at around 13 years old and have been doing it ever since. I also worked at a climbing gym where I helped out other climbers with their questions and taught new climbers how to climb and belay safely.
